auth_sentence.content: Halser augmented exceptional natural reflexes with hours of practicing his draw.

auth_sentence.content: Even Halser was appalled at how often petty quarrels devolved into mortal combat.

auth_sentence.content: "Our time is written on the sand, Mr. Halser," Hickok said.
